edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.openqa.test.team04.passage.basic

Class IdfIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.openqa.test.team04.passage.basic.IdfIndexer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.collections.Transformer

    public class IdfIndexer
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.collections.Transformer
    Reduces the weight of words which are commonly found (ie in more documents). The factor by which it is reduced is chosen from the book as: f(m) = 1 + log(N/d(m)) where N = total number of docs in collection d(m) = number of docs containing word m so where a word is more frequent (ie d(m) is high, f(m) would be low.
